pronunciation: CONCUPISCENCE, [Latin , to covet or lust after, to desire or covet.]

definitions.text: Lust; unlawful irregular of sexual pleasure. In more general sense, the coveting of carnal things, an irregular appetite for worldly good; inclination for unlawful enjoyments.We know even secret concupiscence be sin.Sin, taking occasion by the commandment, wrought me all manner of concupiscence Romans 7:8.
